Compare efficacy adjuvant systemic fluorouracil intraperitoneal mitomycin v systemic fluorouracil alone term survival patient peritoneal cancer originate colorectum . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord center mode surgery . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I : Patients undergo complete resection tumor day 0 . Patients receive mitomycin intraperitoneally ( IP ) 23 hour day 1 fluorouracil IP 24 hour day 2-5 . Patients receive one three systemic chemotherapy regimens 6 month : Regimen I : Patients receive leucovorin calcium IV 2 hour fluorouracil IV 22 hour day 1 2 . Treatment repeat every 2 week . Regimen II : Patients receive fluorouracil IV continuously 7 week . Treatment repeat every 8 week . Regimen III : Leucovorin calcium fluorouracil administer per standard procedure . Arm II : Patients receive treatment arm I without early intraperitoneal chemotherapy . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : At least 90 patient ( 45 per arm ) accrue study .
